hero.description: Revenue based funding and execution support designed for early stage founders

whatWeDoSection.title: Empowering founders with Non Dilutive Capital and execution expertise
whatWeDoSection.description: Here is how we can evaluate

block1.title: Blue Advances
block1.description: Fund recurring growth expenses e.g. customer acquisition, inventory

block2.title: Blue Seed
block2.description: Fund one-offs to scale e.g. product, hiring.

support.title: Blue Growth Support
support.description: Data Insights and full stack expertise to supercharge growth
support.point1: Actionable data insights by connecting revenue, marketing and social media platforms
support.point2: On demand execution expertise at cost or revenue share across proposition design, engineering, marketing, analytics, partnerships, brand, intellectual property, market expansion, talent management.

howItWorksSection.title: Unlocking potential along the growth journey

features.title: Apply online
features.description: Tell us about your business, revenue, and growth plans

features.title: Get an offer
features.description: We evaluate your business and provide a capital offer

features.title: Access funds
features.description: Receive funds quickly and put them to work

ourDiff.title: Fair capital, hassle free
ourDiff.description: Our mission is to level the playing field for early stage growth capital. We provide capital that is unbiased, flexible and non-dilutive with the execution support to accelerate value creation.
